uzbekTraditionalClothing.name: Chopon
uzbekTraditionalClothing.description: Uzun, keng va tikish uslubiga ega bo‘lgan ustki kiyim. Chopon erkaklar va ayollar tomonidan sovuqdan himoyalanish uchun kiyiladi.

uzbekTraditionalClothing.name: Do‘ppi
uzbekTraditionalClothing.description: O‘zbek milliy bosh kiyimi bo‘lib, erkaklar va ayollar tomonidan foydalaniladi.

uzbekTraditionalClothing.name: Atlas ko‘ylak
uzbekTraditionalClothing.description: Ayollar uchun mo‘ljallangan ipak matodan tikilgan ko‘ylak. Atlas O‘zbekistonda juda qadrlanadi.

uzbekTraditionalClothing.name: Adras
uzbekTraditionalClothing.description: Paxta va ipakdan tayyorlangan mato bo‘lib, undan ko‘ylak, kamzul, chopon va boshqa kiyimlar tikiladi.

uzbekTraditionalClothing.name: Lozim va ko‘ylak
uzbekTraditionalClothing.description: Ayollar kiyadigan an’anaviy lozim (tor shim) va uzun ko‘ylakdan iborat kiyimlar to‘plami.
designFeatures: Tor lozim va uzun ko‘ylak kombinatsiyasi

uzbekTraditionalClothing.name: Kamzul
uzbekTraditionalClothing.description: Ayollar va erkaklar kiyadigan, yengsiz ustki kiyim. Odatda milliy ko‘ylak yoki chopon ustidan kiyiladi.

uzbekTraditionalClothing.name: Belbog‘
uzbekTraditionalClothing.description: Erkaklar va ayollar uchun milliy kiyimlar bilan birga taqiladigan kamar.

uzbekTraditionalClothing.name: Gulli ro‘mol
uzbekTraditionalClothing.description: Ayollar tomonidan boshni yopish uchun ishlatiladigan bezakli ro‘mol.
